pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 4, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, May 4, 2016:

Ottawa

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 237-C
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media will be allowed into the National Caucus meeting for coverage of the Prime Ministerâ€™s opening remarks
  • Media should gather in the House of Commons Hall of Honour for 9:30 a.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and will hold a media availability.

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Journalists who are not members of the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery will require accreditation from the gallery in advance. For more information, contact Collin Lafrance at collin.lafrance@parl.gc.ca.
  • Out-of-town journalists can also dial in to listen to the news conference. Please note these will be set up as listen-only mode lines. International callers must dial the local phone number for proper access.

Participant dial-in numbers
Local: 613-960-7527
Toll-free: 1-877-413-4815
Pass code: 2679937

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
